features: 8-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Gentle Daily Face Toner to tone and refresh skin without stripping it of its natural moisture

The alcohol-free facial toner is specially formulated to provide clean, refreshing toning without the harsh, drying effects of alcohol. It gently removes impurities and reconditions skin without clogging pores
Fragrance-free gentle toner respects your skin's moisture barrier and leaves your skin feeling fresh and clean without tightness and drying
The face toner is hypoallergenic and formulated to be free of fragrances, alcohol, parabens, phthalates and sulfates. Its recyclable bottle is made with 50% post-consumer recycled plastic

From a dermatologist-recommended brand, use this alcohol-free facial toner to tone and refresh skin as a part of your daily skincare routine. To use, moisten cotton ball with fragrance-free toner and apply to face with gentle upward strokes
body.description: Tone and refresh skin without stripping it of its natural moisture with Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Daily Face Toner. This facial toner from a dermatologist-recommended skin care brand gently removes impurities and reconditions skin without clogging pores. Specially formulated to provide clean, refreshing toning without the harsh, drying effects of alcohol, the toner respects skin's moisture barrier and leaves it feeling fresh and clean without tightness and drying. The hypoallergenic toner is fragrance-, paraben-, phthalate-, and sulfate-free. To use as part of your daily skin care routine, moisten a cotton ball with the clarifying toner and apply to face with gentle upward strokes. Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Face Toner is packaged in a bottle made with 50% post consumer recycled plastic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: To Use: Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying this product. Moisten a cotton ball with the clarifying toner. Apply to face with gentle upward strokes. Results: Gently remove impurities and recondition skin while respecting your skin's moisture barrier and without clogging pores. Your skin will feel fresh and clean without tightness or drying.

Cleanse Cleanse skin of makeup, dirt and oil using a facial cleanser. Moisten a cotton ball with Neutrogena Alcohol Free Toner and gently apply to face Treat After you cleanse your skin, spot treatments and serums can help prep and treat your skin Moisturize Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate your skin Protect If you're prepping for the day, don't forget to apply sunscreen! We recommend using a minimum of SPF 30 to protect your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a good, basic skin care product/alcohol free!
reviews.reviewText: this product has just undergone new packaging, but, so glad to find it again, available for those of us, who depend on it, for skin care every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great for not drying out sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I live in a frigid climate and it's always windy and cold - so typically being outside is harsh on my sensitive skin. I've typically always toned with something that has alcohol in it, but this has toned as if the alcohol is still present but doesn't provide the harsh dry out of my skin like most other products. It's scent free and easy to use. I would absolutely recommend to all the girlies who have sensitive skin or it's the winter months and your skin is feeling a little bit of the harshness!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used after I cleanse my face. Very refreshing! I then apply my moisturizer. Neutrogenia made another one which I liked better but discontinued it, otherwise I would have given it 5 stars. The original one had a nicer sent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: Could not find this item in a store near me. Was happy to see it available on amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this after my cleansing routine, it helps balance my skin and preps for my moisturizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars nice basic toner
reviews.reviewText: Its okay, I was obsessed with the pore refining toner that is discontinued. This one is a few notches down from that one. It is gentle and works nice on my skin, not mad at it.
